awd_titl_txt: New Technologies for Protein Structure Determination by NMR
awd_abstract_narration: This award is for the development of a specific NMR technology with             a long term objective to develop NMR spectroscopy as a powerful                 tool for protein engineering and rational drug design.                          Specifically in this project, Dr. Montelione will develop software              for computer assisted analysis of MD (multi-dimensional) NMR                    spectra, and will develop pulsed field gradient technology for high             resolution NMR with a focus on applications of MD-NMR to the                    analysis of proteins in aqueous solution.  The PFG technology                   represents one of the most exciting frontiers of high field NMR                 spectroscopy today.  If it is successfully developed, it will                   significantly advance our ability to analyze protein molecules that             are currently not amenable to NMR studies.
